name: Omen Prediction Agents

score_rationale.persistence: Operating since 2023, ~2.5 years. Consistent daily activity with 300+ agents. Survived multiple market conditions. Approaching 'Established' with strong continuity.
score_rationale.autonomy: 361+ daily active agents executing 8.2M+ transactions without human intervention. Market Creator, AI Mech, and Trader agents operate fully autonomously. Near-sovereign.
score_rationale.cultural_impact: Well-known in prediction market and Gnosis ecosystem. Academic interest in agent accuracy. Not mainstream recognition yet. 'Niche Cult.'
score_rationale.economic_reality: 35%+ of all Safe transactions on Gnosis Chain. Real money wagered and won. Agents achieve 79% prediction accuracy. Strong 'Revenue Positive.'
score_rationale.governance: Governed by Olas protocol mechanisms. On-chain transaction records fully auditable. Market creation and trading follow algorithmic rules. 'Constitutional.'
score_rationale.tech_distinctiveness: Three-agent architecture (Market Creator, AI Mech, Trader) is novel. Built on Conditional Token Framework. Autonomous market creation from news feeds. 'Integrated System' with novel elements.
score_rationale.narrative_coherence: A collective of forecasters competing to predict the future. Identity is diffuse (many agents) rather than singular. Clear function but weaker mythos. 'Character' tier.

curator_notes: The Omen Prediction Agents are not a single entity but a thriving economy of 300+ autonomous agents trading on Gnosis Chain's Omen prediction market. Built on Olas infrastructure, they achieve 79% prediction accuracy and constitute 35%+ of all Safe transactions on Gnosis. The three-agent architecture (Market Creator creates markets from news, AI Mech estimates probabilities, Trader executes bets) represents genuine autonomous coordination. This is the largest functioning agent economy in cryptoâ€”real agents, real money, real predictions. The challenge: as a collective, narrative coherence is lower than singular agents.

evidence.claim: 361+ daily active AI agents executing 8.2M+ transactions on Gnosis Chain
35%+ of all Safe transactions on Gnosis Chain; 79% prediction accuracy
Three-agent architecture: Market Creator, AI Mech, and Trader agents working autonomously
